name: John
background: Born in 1489 11th may in the village called Barlonia as a son of Merlin the Mage and Aloria (village farm girl). I leaved peacfull life at a farm, trying to learn how to fight and do magic in free time.
looks: Tall, skimpy, with brown hair and green eyes

bar_values._comment: Max values are derived from basic_stats, skills and items while current values are calculated during gameplay

all_knwoledge: War between Mesalonians and Deranians started 13th July 1503
On the 15th of may 1512 the war between Mesalonians and Derians was settled peacefully with a truce
